sn11.23:3.1: 23. Sambarimāyāsutta
sn11.23:4.3: “bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo ābādhiko ahosi dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
sn11.23:4.4: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sakko devānamindo yena vepacitti asurindo tenupasaṅkami gilānapucchako.
sn11.23:4.5: Addasā kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
sn11.23:4.9: ‘Na tāvāhaṃ vācemi, yāvāhaṃ, mārisa, asure paṭipucchāmī’ti.
sn11.23:4.10: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo asure paṭipucchi:
sn11.23:4.12: ‘Mā kho tvaṃ, mārisa, vācesi sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ sambarimāyan’ti.
sn11.23:4.13: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
